title: The Heroic Week of Walter Smith
summary: Walter Smith, a 22-year-old with a passion for tutoring and encouraging, discovers his superpowers and transforms into a superhero, protecting his city from disaster over the span of a week.
summaryGerman: Walter Smith, ein 22-Jähriger mit einer Leidenschaft für das Unterrichten und Ermutigen, entdeckt seine Superkräfte und verwandelt sich in einen Superhelden, der seine Stadt eine Woche lang vor Katastrophen schützt.
summaryDutch: Walter Smith, een 22-jarige met een passie voor tutoring en aanmoedigen, ontdekt zijn superkrachten en transformeert in een superheld, die zijn stad een week lang beschermt tegen rampen.
summaryFrench: Walter Smith, un jeune homme de 22 ans passionné par le tutorat et l'encouragement, découvre ses superpouvoirs et se transforme en super-héros, protégeant sa ville des désastres pendant une semaine.

story.text: Walter Smith wakes up feeling strangely energetic. On his way to the university, he accidentally stops a traffic accident with a surprising new strength.
Testing his newfound abilities, Walter saves a cat stuck in a tree, feeling proud and happy to help.
Walter runs into a mysterious figure who warns him about the misuse of powers, leaving him feeling eerie.
Despite the warning, Walter helps a struggling student find her confidence, providing encouragement just when needed.
A villain threatens the city’s power grid. Walter’s tutoring session is cut short as he dashes out to confront the threat, an epic battle ensues.
After his triumphant victory, Walter spends a quiet day at home, reflecting on the responsibilities of his new role.
Feeling romantic, Walter plans an evening walk with his close friend, sharing his secret identity and enjoying a new depth to his life.

ending: As the sun set on Sunday, Walter realized his week had transformed him not just into a superhero, but into a better version of himself.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and the true heroism lies in the simple acts of kindness.
